title: El Pelotazo
overview: Like a pelotazo—the powerful strike of a ball—this show will deliver high-energy sports coverage infused with captivating storytelling and insightful analysis, feature innovative sports highlights, unconventional perspectives, and interactive segments that engage fans in fresh and unexpected ways. Notable segments include: MINUTO DE FAMA: Celebrity guests share their passion for sports and discuss their favorite teams and moments. !SE BUSCA!: A nostalgic look at legendary sports figures, tracking where they are now and what life looks like after the game. MANO A MANO: Exclusive, never-before-heard stories from top athletes worldwide. The show will debut with a look and branding designed specifically for El Pelotazo with cutting-edge technology and multiple vibrant positions that mirror the energy of the show. The set combines a bold brand with high-quality production to enhance the viewing experience with innovative graphics and immersive storytelling elements designed specifically for El Pelotazo.
